mapper.insert: insert into graphs(graphsid , usersid , title , image , contents , addtime , hits ) values(#{graphsid} , #{usersid} , #{title} , #{image} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} )
mapper.update: update graphs set usersid=#{usersid} , title=#{title} , image=#{image} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} where graphsid=#{graphsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username from graphs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by graphsid desc
select a.* , b.username from graphs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by graphsid desc limit 10
select a.* , b.username from graphs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by graphsid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.username from graphs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid and graphsid=#{graphsid} order by graphsid desc

select a.* , b.username from graphs a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and a.image like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{image}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
